bike.description: Blend of high and mid modulus carbon fiber, FEA optimized, NearNet molded, Dyad Elite M30/T700 lay-up, formed down tube and top tube for comfortable portage with SST tubing diameters, oversized tapered seat tube, 1 1/8-1 1/2" tapered head tube with carbon bearing races, EVO carbon BB shell, internal cable routing compatible for both Di2 wires or traditional cables, twin seat stays with post mount disc mounts and brake strut on non-driveside for vibration-free braking, asymmetrical chainstays, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable alloy FD mount and RD hanger.

components.description: Jamis Cross, high modulus carbon fiber, NearNet molded, FEA optimized layup, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, post disc brake mounts with integrated carbon cable cradle with stainless axle interfaces
Ritchey Pro Logic Zero Drop In, integrated, sealed bearing, 1 1/8-1 1/2"
Alex CXD2T Tubeless wheelset. 28H, T2R EXA 23.6mm aero rim profile, cold forged CNC disc hubs with Japanese sealed bearings and Sapim race spokes
Vittoria Cross XG TNT with Tube No Tube technology, 700 x 32c, 150TPI, folding
SRAM 2012 RED rear and RED braze-on front
SRAM 2012 RED Double Tap with Zero-Loss shift technology, carbon fiber, 20-Speed
FSA SLK Light EVO cross double with Press Fit BB system including ceramic bearings, 46/36T, 170mm (48/51), 172.5mm (54/56), 175mm (58/61)
Ritchey Pro EVO Curve, 7075 aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm(48/51), 420mm(54/56), 440mm(58/61)
Ritchey Pro Carbon, 31.6 x 350mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco Concor with Microfil+Kevlar+High Frequency cover and hollow chromoly-moly rails
Avid BB-7 mechanical disc brake with Ti hardware, organic brake pads with alloy backing. Avid HS1 160mm front/140mm rear rotors and SRAM 2012 RED brake levers
